languages.text: {n}Идира оглядывает помещение и смотрит на вас — с оттенком вины во взгляде.{/n} "Вы знаете... я думала, что вы уже все. Совсем. Никогда вас больше не увижу. И я... решила попробовать заново".

{n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира оглядывает помещение и смотрит на вас — с оттенком вины во взгляде.{/n} "Вы знаете... я думала, что вы уже все. Совсем. Никогда вас больше не увижу. И я... решила попробовать заново".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira glances around the room, then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were done. For good. Thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start anew."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira glances around the room, then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were done. For good. Thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start anew."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were done. For good. Thought I'd never see you again. So I, uh, I tried to start anew."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were done. For good. Thought I'd never see you again. So I, uh, I tried to start anew."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは部屋を見渡し、罪悪感に満ちた表情を浮かべてあなたを振り返る。{/n}「その…あなたはもう来ないと思ってた。二度とね。会うことはもうないと思っていたの。だから…もう一度新たにやり直そうと思ったのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは部屋を見渡し、罪悪感に満ちた表情を浮かべてあなたを振り返る。{/n}「その…あなたはもう来ないと思ってた。二度とね。会うことはもうないと思っていたの。だから…もう一度新たにやり直そうと思ったのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉环视一圈房间，之后重新看着你，脸上带着一丝内疚。{/n}“你看……我还以为你完蛋了，死透了。我以为我再也见不到你了，于是我……打算重新开始。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉环视一圈房间，之后重新看着你，脸上带着一丝内疚。{/n}“你看……我还以为你完蛋了。我以为你死透了，再也见不到你了，于是我，呃，打算重新开始。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira examina la sala con la mirada antes de volver la mirada hacia ti con una sutil expresión culpable.{/n} «¿Sabe?... Pensé que había muerto. Del todo. Que no volvería a verl{mf|e|a}. Así que intenté, eh, empezar de cero».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."

traits.locale_text: {n}idira examina la sala con la mirada antes de volver la mirada hacia ti con una sutil expresión culpable.{/n} «¿Sabe?... Pensé que había muerto. De verdad. Que no volvería a verl{mf|e|a}. Así que intenté, eh, empezar de cero».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt sich in dem Raum um und sieht dann mit einem Anflug von Schuldgefühlen wieder zu dir.{/n} "Wisst Ihr ... Ich dachte, Ihr wärt tot. Erledigt. Ich dachte, ich sehe Euch nie wieder. Also habe ich ... versucht, neu anzufangen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt sich in dem Raum um und sieht dann mit einem Anflug von Schuldgefühlen wieder zu dir.{/n} "Wisst Ihr ... Ich dachte, Ihr wäret hinüber. Endgültig. Ich dachte, ich würde Euch nie wiedersehen. Also habe ich, äh, versucht, neu anzufangen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira promène son regard sur la pièce puis se tourne vers vous avec un air vaguement coupable.{/n} « Vous savez... Je vous croyais {mf|mort|morte}. Pour de bon. Je ne pensais pas vous revoir un jour. Alors, j'ai... voulu prendre un nouveau départ. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira promène son regard sur la pièce puis se tourne vers vous avec un air vaguement coupable.{/n} « Vous savez... Je vous croyais {mf|mort|morte}. Pour de bon. Je ne pensais pas vous revoir un jour. Alors, j'ai... voulu prendre un nouveau départ. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, odaya göz gezdirdikten sonra yüzünde hafif bir suçluluk ifadesiyle sana dönüyor.{/n} "Yani... Öldün sanıyordum. Seni kaybettim, bir daha göremem sanıyordum. O yüzden de... Yeni bir hayata adım atmaya çalıştım."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira glances around the room and then looks back at you with a tinge of guilt on her face.{/n} "You know... I thought you were gone. Done for. I thought I'd never see you again. So I... tried to start over."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira odaya göz gezdirdikten sonra yüzünde hafif bir suçluluk ifadesiyle yine sana dönüyor.{/n} "Yani... Öldün sanıyordum. Seni kaybettim, bir daha göremem sanıyordum. O yüzden de... Sil baştan yapmaya çalıştım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
